auth.signInSubtitle: Welcome back to your financial dashboard
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link
auth.resetLinkSent: We've sent a password reset link to {email}

errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordUppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
errors.passwordLowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
errors.passwordSpecial: Password must contain a special character
errors.accountLocked: Account is locked. Please try again later.
errors.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.passwordTooCommon: This password is too common. Please choose a stronger password.
errors.passwordContainsPersonalInfo: Password should not contain your name or email
errors.resetRequestFailed: Unable to process your request. Please try again later.
errors.resetTokenMissing: Reset token is missing. Please use the link from your email.
errors.passwordRequirements: Password does not meet all requirements
errors.resetFailed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

emailVerification.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your email address.
emailVerification.successMessage: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in to your account.
emailVerification.errorMessage: We couldn't verify your email. The link may have expired or already been used.
emailVerification.missingParams: The verification link is incomplete. Please check your email for the correct link.
emailVerification.resendSuccess: Verification email sent! Check your inbox.
emailVerification.resendError: Failed to resend verification email. Please try again.
emailVerification.checkEmailMessage: We've sent a verification email to your inbox. Please click the link in the email to verify your account.
emailVerification.checkSpamFolder: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder.
emailVerification.pleaseVerifyEmail: Please verify your email address before logging in. Check your inbox for the verification link.

auth.forgotPasswordSentDescription: If your email address is registered with us, you will receive a password reset link shortly.
auth.forgotPasswordSpamNote: The link will expire in 30 minutes. Be sure to check your spam folder if you don't see the email.
auth.forgotPasswordHelper: No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetSuccessDescription: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
auth.passwordResetSecurityNote: For security, you have been logged out of all other devices.
auth.invalidResetLinkDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has been corrupted. Please request a new password reset.
auth.acceptTerms: I agree to the <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>
auth.acceptTermsRequired: You must accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
auth.legalFooter: By using MyMascada, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.overview: Here's an overview of your financial activity

emptyState.title: Ready to track your finances?
emptyState.subtitle: Get started by adding your first transaction or importing bank statements.

akahuSync.syncSuccessNoNew: Bank data synced! No new transactions found.
akahuSync.syncPartial: Sync completed with some issues. {successful} of {total} accounts synced.
akahuSync.syncFailed: Failed to sync bank data. Please try again.

onboarding.title: Welcome to MyMascada!
onboarding.subtitle: Let's get your finances set up. Complete these steps in any order.

addAccount.title: Add an Account
addAccount.description: Create your first bank account, credit card, or savings account to start tracking balances.

initCategories.title: Set Up Categories
initCategories.description: Initialize default spending categories so your transactions can be organized automatically.

addTransactions.title: Add Your Transactions
addTransactions.description: Enter transactions manually or import a CSV file from your bank.

hero.createGoalDesc: Setting a financial goal gives your money purpose and direction.

coaching.noGoals: Setting a goal gives your finances direction.
coaching.onTrack: Great pace! You'll reach {goalName} on time.
coaching.behindSchedule: An extra {amount} this month would help with {goalName}.
coaching.overSpending: Your spending is exceeding your income this month.
coaching.emergencyMotivation1: An emergency fund covers 3 months of expenses — your safety net for unexpected job loss.
coaching.emergencyMotivation2: 40% of adults can't cover a $400 emergency. Your fund puts you ahead.
coaching.emergencyMotivation3: Medical bills, car repairs, appliance breakdowns — your emergency fund handles them all.
coaching.emergencyMotivation4: Financial peace of mind starts with knowing you have a cushion. Start adding to your goal today.
coaching.emergencyMotivation5: An emergency fund means you'll never have to rely on credit cards in a crisis.
coaching.progressEncouragement: You've saved {amount} toward {goalName}. Every bit counts!
coaching.default: Keep going! Every step counts toward your goals.
coaching.title: Financial Insight

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?
transactions.deleteConfirmFull: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This action cannot be undone.

status.description: Cleared: Transaction has been processed by the bank. Pending: Transaction is not yet confirmed.

aiCategorization.title: AI Assistant
aiCategorization.subtitle: Let AI help categorize your transactions instantly

aiCategorization.unavailableDescription: The AI categorization service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
aiCategorization.showingFirst: Showing first 12 transactions. Use "Select All" for all {total} transactions.
aiCategorization.limitNotice: AI Assistant is limited to the first 25 transactions. Use "Auto-Categorize with Rules" to process all {total} transactions.

categorizationRibbon.title: Smart Categorization
categorizationRibbon.subtitle: Choose how to categorize your transactions

duplicates.markedNotDuplicate: Marked as not duplicate - this group will not appear in future scans

duplicates.foundGroups: Found {groups} duplicate group{groups, plural, one {} other {s}} with {transactions} transactions

transactions.getStarted: Get started by adding your first transaction.
transactions.deleteSelectedConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} transactions? This action cannot be undone.

transactions.noTransactionsForAccount: No transactions found for this account.
transactions.statusHelp: Cleared: Transaction has been processed by the bank. Pending: Transaction is not yet confirmed.
transactions.amountHelp: Enter the amount as a positive number
transactions.personalNoteHelp: Optional personal description for this transaction
transactions.createAccountFirst: You need to create an account first before adding transactions.
transactions.transferInfo: This is part of a transfer between accounts. Changes to the amount will automatically update the related transaction. Categories cannot be assigned to transfer transactions.
transactions.transactionCreatedDesc: Your transaction has been saved successfully.
transactions.createFailed: Failed to create transaction. Please try again.
transactions.categorizeTransferExclusion: Transfer transactions are excluded from categorization as they do not require categories.
transactions.categorizeNoMatchesDescription: No {status} transactions match your current filters. Try adjusting or clearing your filters.
transactions.transferUpdateNote: Transfer amount and related transaction updated automatically.
transactions.updateFailed: Failed to update transaction. Please try again.

transfers.foundMatches: Found {count} potential transfer match{count, plural, one {} other {es}}

transfers.confirmSuccess: Successfully confirmed {count} transfer{count, plural, one {} other {s}}
transfers.confirmFailed: Failed to confirm any transfers ({count} errors)

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.subtitle: Manage your financial accounts
accounts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action cannot be undone.
accounts.archiveConfirm: Are you sure you want to archive this account?
accounts.archiveConfirmDetails:
Are you sure you want to archive "{name}"?

Archiving will hide this account from your main view but preserve all transaction history. You can reactivate it later if needed.
accounts.permanentDeleteConfirm:
Are you sure you want to completely delete "{name}"?

WARNING: This action is IRREVERSIBLE!

This will PERMANENTLY DELETE:
• The account "{name}"
• ALL transactions in this account
• ALL transaction history and records

Consider "Archive" instead if you want to preserve data.
accounts.noAccountsDescription: Get started by creating your first account to track your finances.
accounts.archiveHasTransactions: This account cannot be archived because it has transactions. Transaction history must be preserved for data integrity.
accounts.archiveFailed: Failed to archive account. Please try again.
accounts.deletedSuccess: Account "{name}" and all its transactions have been permanently deleted.
accounts.deleteFailed: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
accounts.createNewAccountDesc: Add a new financial account to track your money
accounts.accountCreatedDesc: Your new account has been created successfully.
accounts.accountUpdatedDesc: Your account has been updated successfully.
accounts.accountNotFoundDesc: The account you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have permission to edit it.
accounts.editCarefullyDesc: This account has transactions. Some fields are restricted to maintain data integrity.

editCarefullyList.balance: Balance changes: Use the "Add Adjustment Transaction" feature instead
editCarefullyList.currency: Currency changes: Only updates the label, no conversion is performed
editCarefullyList.type: Account type changes: May affect categorization and reports

accounts.deleteAccountWarning: Once you delete an account, there is no going back. This action is permanent and will:

deleteAccountList.transactions: Remove ALL transactions associated with this account
deleteAccountList.history: Remove ALL transaction history and records

accounts.typeAccountName: To confirm deletion, please type the account name exactly as shown:
accounts.accountNameMismatch: Account name does not match. Deletion cancelled for your safety.

form.name: Account Name
form.initialBalanceHelp: This sets the starting balance. Once you have transactions, the balance will be calculated automatically.
form.accountBalanceDesc: Account balances are automatically calculated from transactions and cannot be edited directly. Use transactions to modify your balance (deposits, withdrawals, transfers).
form.currencyChangeNoticeDesc: This only changes the currency label. Existing transaction amounts will NOT be converted. For example, if you change from USD to EUR, a $100 transaction will show as €100.
form.saveFailed: Failed to save account. Please try again.

balanceAdjustment.title: Balance Adjustment
balanceAdjustment.description: Enter your verified balance from your bank statement to automatically calculate and apply any necessary adjustments.
balanceAdjustment.balancesMatchDesc: Your calculated balance matches your bank statement
balanceAdjustment.confirmDesc: Please review the adjustment details before proceeding.
balanceAdjustment.largeAdjustmentDesc: This adjustment is more than 10% of your current balance. Please double-check your verified balance.
balanceAdjustment.auditTrailInfo: This will create an adjustment transaction in your account history. The transaction will show the reason for the adjustment and maintain a complete audit trail.
balanceAdjustment.enterVerifiedBalance: Please enter the verified balance from your bank statement
balanceAdjustment.adjustmentFailed: Failed to create adjustment transaction. Please try again.

sharing.invitationSentDetails: An invitation has been sent to {email}
sharing.noShares: This account hasn't been shared with anyone yet
sharing.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke {name}'s access to this account?

sharing.acceptFailed: Failed to accept invitation. Please try again.
sharing.declineFailed: Failed to decline invitation. Please try again.

reconciliation.title: Reconciliation
reconciliation.balanceWithStatement: Balance your account with your bank statement

reconciliation.importDescAkahu: Fetch transactions directly from your bank via Akahu, or upload a bank statement file.

reconciliation.connectToAkahu: Connect this account to Akahu to fetch transactions directly from your bank.
reconciliation.matchTransactionsDesc: We'll automatically match your bank transactions with your recorded transactions.

reconciliation.longPressToDrag: Long press to drag on mobile
reconciliation.noTransactionsMatchFilters: No transactions match your current filters.
reconciliation.deleteTransactionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This action cannot be undone.

reconciliation.akahuDescription: Fetch your bank transactions directly from Akahu and compare them with your MyMascada records.

reconciliation.akahuBalanceNote: If not provided, we'll use the current balance from Akahu for comparison.
reconciliation.selectBothDates: Please select both start and end dates
reconciliation.startDateBeforeEndDate: Start date must be before end date
reconciliation.startBankReconciliationDesc: Compare your bank statement with your recorded transactions to ensure accuracy.
reconciliation.dragAndDropFile: Drag and drop your CSV or OFX file here, or click to browse
reconciliation.reviewResultsDesc: Review the matching results and resolve any discrepancies.

reconciliation.bankTransactionsRequired: Please add some bank transactions first

aiCsv.title: AI CSV Import
aiCsv.subtitle: Smart column detection & mapping
aiCsv.description: Upload any CSV file from your bank. Our AI will automatically detect columns and suggest the best mapping for transaction data.

ofx.title: OFX/QFX Import
ofx.subtitle: Direct bank file import
ofx.description: Upload OFX or QFX files directly from your bank. These files contain structured transaction data and require no mapping.

ofxUpload.successSubtitle: Your OFX file has been parsed and is ready for reconciliation.
ofxUpload.infoSubtitle: Upload OFX or QFX files directly from your bank. These files contain structured transaction data that requires no mapping. Perfect for reconciliation.
ofxUpload.processingSubtitle: Parsing transaction data and account information
ofxUpload.uploadHelp: Drag and drop your file here, or click to browse

requirements.compatibility: • Works with files from all major banks and financial institutions
requirements.reconciliationOnly: • For reconciliation only - no transactions will be created

features.standardized: • Standardized format used by all major banks
features.noMapping: • No column mapping required - data is pre-structured
features.detailsIncluded: • Includes transaction IDs, dates, amounts, and descriptions
features.mostAccurate: • Most accurate method for bank data import

akahuBalanceComparison.title: Balance Comparison

tooltip.currentBalance: Balance shown is the current account balance from your bank, which may differ from your statement balance if recent transactions haven't been processed.
tooltip.statementBalance: Balance shown is based on your provided statement balance.

akahuBalanceComparison.minorDifference: Minor difference likely due to rounding. Review the matched transactions for accuracy.
akahuBalanceComparison.reviewUnmatched: Review unmatched transactions below to identify the discrepancy.
akahuBalanceComparison.currentBalanceNote: Note: This is the current balance from Akahu, not a statement balance.
akahuBalanceComparison.pendingAdjustment: Bank balance adjusted by {amount} ({count, plural, one {# pending transaction} other {# pending transactions}} excluded).

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Optional description of what this rule does
form.priorityHelp: Rules with lower priority numbers are processed first
form.patternHelp: The text pattern to match against transaction descriptions

advanced.accountTypesHelp: Leave unchecked to apply to all account types

test.testHelp: This will test your rule against recent transactions to see what would be matched

bankConnections.title: Bank Connections
bankConnections.subtitle: Connect your bank accounts to automatically import transactions
bankConnections.aboutDescription: We use Akahu to securely connect to your New Zealand bank accounts. Your credentials are never stored by MyMascada - all authentication happens directly with your bank through Akahu's secure platform.

apiKey.label: API Key

model.label: Model

ai.removeConfirm: Are you sure? This will remove your personal AI configuration and revert to the server default.

setup.step3: Copy the bot token that BotFather gives you

token.label: Bot Token

telegram.connectedDescription: Your Telegram bot is active. Messages sent to the bot will be answered by Alce, and will appear in your web chat history too.
telegram.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure? The bot will stop responding and you'll need to set it up again to reconnect.

errors.connectFailed: Failed to connect Telegram bot. Please check the token and try again.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data
privacy.subtitle: Manage your data and account settings

export.title: Export Your Data
export.description: Download all your personal data in JSON format. This includes your accounts, transactions, categories, rules, and other settings. This is your right under LGPD/GDPR (Article 20 - Data Portability).
export.success: Your data has been downloaded successfully

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone and complies with your right to be forgotten under LGPD/GDPR (Article 17).
delete.confirmError: Please type DELETE to confirm account deletion
delete.success: Your account has been deleted. Goodbye!

warning.title: This action is permanent and irreversible!
warning.message: Once you delete your account, there is no way to recover it. All of the following will be permanently deleted:
warning.item2: All your categories and categorization rules
warning.item3: All your bank connections and sync history

errors.loadSummaryFailed: Failed to load your data summary
errors.exportFailed: Failed to export your data. Please try again.
errors.deleteFailed: Failed to delete your account. Please try again.

review.transactionsImported: Your transactions have been imported after conflict review.
review.title: Review Import

guidance.title: How to review your import:
guidance.body: You can review transactions individually OR use bulk actions. Bulk actions only affect undecided transactions (those you haven't clicked Import/Skip on yet).
guidance.individual: Individual: Click Import/Skip on each transaction
guidance.bulk: Bulk: Use "Bulk" buttons to apply decisions to multiple items

exact.title: Exact Duplicates
exact.description: Transactions that exactly match existing records

potential.title: Potential Duplicates

transfer.title: Transfer Conflicts
transfer.description: Transactions that conflict with existing transfer components

toasts.analysisComplete: Import analysis completed! Please review conflicts.

amountConventionSummary.negativeExpense: Negative values are expenses, positive are income
amountConventionSummary.positiveExpense: Positive values are expenses, negative are income

amountConventionOptions.negativeExpense: Negative values are expenses, positive are income

mappingReview.amountConventionHelp: How your bank represents transaction amounts

mappingReview.typeValueNotMapped: Not mapped - will use amount sign
mappingReview.previewSubtitle: See how your transactions will be imported based on your current settings

amountConventionAppliedDescriptions.negativeExpense: Positive amounts will be treated as income, negative amounts as expenses.
amountConventionAppliedDescriptions.positiveExpense: Positive amounts will be treated as expenses, negative amounts as income (typical for credit cards).
amountConventionAppliedDescriptions.typeColumnCustom: Transaction type will be determined by your custom mappings of type column values.
amountConventionAppliedDescriptions.typeColumnDefault: Transaction type will be determined from type column values using common patterns (credit/debit, etc.).

success.importedMessage: Your transactions have been imported using AI-powered mapping.
success.reviewMessage: Your transaction review has been completed. All transactions were processed according to your decisions.

bankConnections.title: Bank Connections

bankConnections.disconnectConfirm:
Are you sure you want to disconnect "{account}" from {provider}?

This will:
• Remove the bank connection
• Stop automatic transaction imports
• Revoke access to your bank data

Your existing imported transactions will not be affected.

budgets.title: Budgets
budgets.subtitle: Manage your spending limits by category
budgets.noBudgetsDescription: Create your first budget to start tracking spending against your goals.
budgets.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the budget "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

wizard.title: Create Budget
wizard.subtitle: Set up spending limits by category
wizard.step1Description: Name your budget and choose the period
wizard.step2Description: Select categories and set spending limits
wizard.step3Description: Review your budget and create it
wizard.isRecurringHelp: When enabled, a new budget period will be created when this one ends
wizard.selectCategoryFirst: Select at least one category to set budget amounts
wizard.allowRolloverHelp: Unused budget carries over to next period
wizard.includeSubcategoriesHelp: Spending from subcategories counts toward this limit
wizard.noSuggestions: Not enough transaction history for suggestions

rollover.title: Process Rollovers
rollover.description: Process budget rollovers for ended periods. This will carry forward unused budgets (or deficits) to new periods for recurring budgets.
rollover.previewMode: Preview Mode - No changes will be made

landing.heroSubtitle: Your AI-powered personal finance management application. Track transactions, manage budgets, and gain insights into your financial health.

features.trackingDescription: Easily track all your financial transactions with automated categorization and CSV import capabilities.
features.insightsDescription: Get intelligent categorization and insights about your spending patterns with our AI engine.
features.securityDescription: Your financial data is secure with enterprise-grade encryption and privacy-first design.

goals.title: Goals
goals.subtitle: Track your financial goals and milestones
goals.noGoalsDescription: Set your first financial goal and start tracking your progress.
goals.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

detail.updateProgressDescription: Enter the current amount saved towards this goal

delete.title: Delete Goal
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this goal? This action cannot be undone.

form.createSubtitle: Define your financial target and track your progress
form.name: Goal Name
form.namePlaceholder: e.g., Emergency Fund, Vacation, New Car
form.deadlineHelp: Optional. Set a target date to stay on track.
form.linkedAccountHelp: Optionally link an account to track its balance alongside this goal.
form.validation: Please fill in all required fields correctly.
form.progressHelp: Enter the current saved amount toward your goal of {target}.

welcome.title: Welcome to MyMascada!
welcome.subtitle: Let's set up your financial profile in a few quick steps.

income.title: What's your monthly income?
income.subtitle: Enter your total monthly income after taxes.
income.label: Monthly Income
income.helper: You can estimate — this isn't permanent.
income.detailText: Set a realistic baseline. You can refine this later once your actuals are tracked.

expenses.title: What are your monthly expenses?
expenses.subtitle: Enter your total average monthly spending.
expenses.label: Monthly Expenses
expenses.helper: Include rent, food, transport, and subscriptions.
expenses.detailText: This does not need perfect precision. A strong estimate gives you immediate control.

goalSuggestion.title: Your First Goal
goalSuggestion.subtitle: Based on your finances, we suggest:
goalSuggestion.why: 3 months of expenses protects you from unexpected job loss, medical emergencies, or car repairs.
goalSuggestion.timelineHintPositive: At your current surplus, this goal can build quickly.
goalSuggestion.timelineHintNegative: No monthly surplus yet. You can still define the target and adjust as you go.

dataEntry.title: How would you like to add transactions?
dataEntry.subtitle: Choose how you'll track your finances.
dataEntry.csvDesc: Upload a file from your bank

complete.title: You're all set!
complete.subtitle: Your financial profile is ready. Let's start tracking!
